S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-4463; JMX test in nightly test suite failed with: JMXTest:clientjava.lang.InterruptedException DERBY-5028; InterruptResilienceTest passes with IBM 1.6 SR9 but creates javacore dumps Adjusted the skipping of this test with ibm jvms to only skip with 1.5; Added setting of derby.stream.error.extendedDiagSeverityLevel to 50000 to prevent unnecessary javacore dump files.
